description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes and styling for the application, including light and dark mode support.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application, defining layout and color scheme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header component, including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, with hover effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including responsive design and hover effects.
